about_the_game:
Warning:

This game features intimate exploration of belly-centric fetishes such as stuffing and inflation.
With that in mind, have fun!

Welcome to Project Quimbly!

Take control of our MC(Max) and go around his hometown meeting our cute cast of lovable girls the whole way though! Max will try his best to convince all the girls he meets to take part in his secret belly stuffing and inflation fetish.

Features:

Project Quimbly Features include

  • • Date and inflate our cast of cute girls!
    • Learn every girl's sexual preferences
    • Work your choice to pay for food to help with the stuffing mini-game
    • Max out character's stomach capacities by stuffing everyday

Game-play:

Game play is that of a regular visual novel with plenty of mini games on the side to keep your engagement!

content_descriptors.notes:
Warning:
Topics of Domestic Violence come up in this game.

The game surrounds sexual content in the form of inflation.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual Core 2.0Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.0Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750Ti
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
